      10             : /* A rounded rectangle abstraction.
      11             :  *
      12             :  * This can represent a rectangle with a different pair of radii on each corner.
      13             :  *
      14             :  * Note: CoreGraphics and Direct2D only support rounded rectangle with the same
      15             :  * radii on all corners. However, supporting CSS's border-radius requires the extra flexibility. */
      16             : struct RoundedRect {
      17             :     typedef mozilla::gfx::RectCornerRadii RectCornerRadii;

      20           0 :     void Deflate(gfxFloat aTopWidth, gfxFloat aBottomWidth, gfxFloat aLeftWidth, gfxFloat aRightWidth) {
      21             :         // deflate the internal rect
      22           0 :         rect.x += aLeftWidth;
      23           0 :         rect.y += aTopWidth;
      24           0 :         rect.width = std::max(0., rect.width - aLeftWidth - aRightWidth);
      25           0 :         rect.height = std::max(0., rect.height - aTopWidth - aBottomWidth);
      26             : 
      27             :         corners.radii[mozilla::eCornerTopLeft].width =
